scripts.build: npx turbo run build && echo '🚀 Build completed'
scripts.build:packages: npx turbo run build --filter="./packages/**/*" && echo '🚀 Build packages completed'
scripts.clean:
npx turbo run clean && echo 'root: cleaning' && rimraf node_modules .turbo && echo '
🧼 Clean completed'
scripts.test: npx turbo run test && echo '🧪 Test completed'
scripts.test:packages: npx turbo run test --filter="./packages/**/*" && echo '🧪 Test packages completed'
scripts.lint: npx turbo run lint && echo '🧹 Lint completed'
scripts.lint:packages: npx turbo run lint --filter="./packages/**/*" && echo '🧹 Lint packages completed'
scripts.check-types: npx turbo run check-types && echo '🔎 Check types completed'
scripts.check-types:packages: npx turbo run check-types --filter="./packages/**/*" && echo '🔎 Check types packages completed'
scripts.bundle: npx turbo run bundle && echo '📦 Bundle completed'
